name: Power Cells (☽ GAËL SACRÉ ☾)
description:
POWER CELLS

In a cyberpunk future, Ankh & Ramek are driving to reach the spaceport in time to save their son before he's taken away. On the way, they also try to catch nanodrones, a threat that could destroy the entire city.

Power Cells is a narrative racing puzzle with a very minimalist 1-bit aesthetic. It's inspired by synthwave, cyberpunk & space opera.

Tip : There's two endings. You got a better ending if you catch enough nanadrones. ;)

///

This game was created with Bitsy engine, for the You can't have it all jam.

Note : English is not my native language. I apologize for my mistakes. If you find some, please report them :)
